metaDescription: Specialists in drone filming, aerial live streaming, and drone light shows. Transform your event into a visual spectacle.
metaKeywords: drone, aerial filming, drone show, drone lights, drone footage, mato grosso, cuiaba, dronyimagem
ogDescription: Specialists in drone filming, aerial live streaming, and drone light shows. Transform your event into a visual spectacle.
heroSubtitle: DronyImagem specializes in drone filming, aerial live streaming, and drone light shows, creating unique experiences that delight audiences and enhance your brand.
servicesSubtitle: From the sky to your audience: filming, streaming, and spectacles.
service1Desc: Capture every detail of your event with high-resolution drone filming. Ideal for concerts, weddings, corporate events, advertising campaigns, and institutional productions. Our drones record unique angles that highlight the grandeur and energy of your event.
service2Desc: Surprise your audience with a live broadcast made by drones, showing your event in real time with stable, high-quality images. Perfect for festivals, fairs, sports, and corporate events that need visual impact and complete coverage.
service3Desc: Enchant the audience with a drone show synchronized with lights and music. Perfect for event openings, brand activations, inaugurations, and special celebrations. Each show is planned with exclusive scripts, animations, and choreographies, making the sky the main stage of your event.
portfolioSubtitle: From aerial filming to drone light shows, DronyImagem has transformed corporate events, festivals, and audiovisual productions into unique visual experiences. Check out our projects and see how our aerial filming and drone shows impact the audience in every detail.
aboutSubtitle: Technology, creativity, and innovation in the air
aboutIntro: Created by two brothers from Mato Grosso fascinated by technology and passionate about constant evolution.
aboutP1: At DronyImagem, we combine professional aerial filming, live image transmission, and drone shows with synchronized lights to transform events into memorable experiences.
aboutP2: Our team consists of professionals specialized in audiovisuals and drone piloting, ready to record every moment with cinematic quality, safety, and technical precision.
aboutP3: We believe that every flight is an opportunity to tell a new story ‚Äî from above, with emotion and impact. With DronyImagem, your event gains a new perspective and the visibility it deserves.
valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide our vision and excellence in every service.
value1Desc: We unite technology and creativity to tell stories from above. We transform your event into a unique visual spectacle that enchants and evokes emotion.
value2Desc: We use cutting-edge aerial technology‚Äîfrom light shows to live streams‚Äîto give your event a new perspective and the visual impact it deserves.
value3Desc: We guarantee technical precision and cinematic quality in every flight. Our specialized team captures unique angles with complete safety, valuing your brand.
missionSubtitle: To be the link between the sky and creative vision, elevating the perception and impact of your projects.
missionDesc: Our mission is to transform your event into a memorable visual spectacle. We use cutting-edge aerial technology‚Äîfrom cinematic filming to light shows‚Äîto tell your story from above, with safety, creativity, and impact.
contactSubtitle: Let's talk about your next aerial project!
footerDev: Developed with passion for aerial technology.
